review: within 3 months I convinced through iui treatment. as we where trying from so long( 6 years)  and consultanted so many doctors  but nothing happened after that she came like angle in our life. her treatment is systematic & well explained. it seems like she came here to introduce you to the happiness of becoming parents.

review: **** ****** *** **** ** ***** Her diagnosis seems to spot on this is first time we visited her and found that she is the one for us

context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: I am very Happy. Within 8 months of duration my wife confirmed with pregnancy. Doctors and staffs of the IVF dept. The Rainbow hospital is best hospital for a women. We would like to specially thank Dr.Preeti Reddy Dr devika and her team for all her guidance and support. Thank you Dr Preethi Reddy Dr devika and the whole IVF team of the Rainbow Hospitals Madhapur. My wife name is Mrs P.ROOPA. THANK YOU !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ******* ***** ** **** ********* ********** ** ********** She explains the issues very well so that we can understand and follow . The Process is very systematic in Birthright by Rainbow Fertility Centre. You don't need to worry at all.
For fertility related issues , i strongly recommend Dr. Preethi Reddy and Birthright by Rainbow Fertility Centre.
